HttpPackageConfiguration.description: The HTTP package configuration properties for the requested VOD source.

properties.name: Path
properties.description: The relative path to the URL for this VOD source. This is combined with SourceLocation::HttpConfiguration::BaseUrl to form a valid URL.

type.description: The relative path to the URL for this VOD source. This is combined with SourceLocation::HttpConfiguration::BaseUrl to form a valid URL.

properties.name: SourceGroup
properties.description: The name of the source group. This has to match one of the Channel::Outputs::SourceGroup.

type.description: The name of the source group. This has to match one of the Channel::Outputs::SourceGroup.

properties.name: HttpPackageConfigurations
properties.description: A list of HTTP package configuration parameters for this live source.

type.description: A list of HTTP package configuration parameters for this live source.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags to assign to the live source.

type.description: The tags to assign to the live source.
